zh: 上/興櫃公司當年度截至當季之營業收入、營業利益、營業外收支淨額、稅後純益、期末股本、每股稅後純益、每股淨值及流動比率等財務資料，並與前一年度同期比較。

en: Sales Revenue, income from operations, non-operating income and expenses, netincome, capital at end of period, earnigns per share, net asset value per share, and current ratio for TPEx Regular/Emerging Listed company as of the end of the current quarter in the current year.
